      • getVersion

        public static java.lang.String getVersion()
        Returns build version of SDK.
        Returns:
        string identifier representing builds version.

      • getConfig

        public static PIOConfig getConfig()
        Returns current PIOConfig holding configuration supplied with starting of PIO SDK. Reference could change in runtime if application gets restarted when PIOConfig is restored from permanent storage.
        Returns:
        PIOConfig instance, or if current application instance was killed and restarted.

      • setConfig

        public static void setConfig(Context context,
             PIOConfig config)
                      throws PIOException
        Sets the PrintIO SDK configuration.
        Parameters:
        context - The active Context for your application.
        config - The PIOConfig holding configuration of PIO SDK.
        Throws:
        PIOException - If the configuration is invalid.

      • start

        public static void start(Context context)
                  throws PIOException
        Starts the PrintIO SDK.
        Parameters:
        context - The active Context for your application.
        Throws:
        PIOException - If an error occurs while starting SDK.

        Returns last successful order information or null if nothing was ordered.

        Returns:
